Summary: i was on the phone with my bestfriend and i opened my window to get fresh air
divs: Sighting Detailsim laying in bed on the phone with my best friend pete and i got hot so i opened up my window and i just so happen to see lights flashing in the sky so i was like the stars are blinking faster then usual so i stood there and watched them for at least 20 mins and went to go get monoculars so i could get a better look and it was so weird that one of the objects was longer then it appearedi was kinda freaking out but i had the urge to actually find out more
